Name: Victoria Indomable
Ingredients: 75 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled glass.
History: Spanish Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail by Jaime Añon at Terraza Sojo Palace in Córdoba.
Nutrition: One serving of Victoria Indomable contains 269 calories
Garnish: 3 drops chocolate bitters, orange twist & cocktail cherry
